summary: All three requirements are implemented in the diff. REQ-1 is satisfied by frontend/index.html with the <title>Shake.com</title> tag and the apple-mobile-web-app-title meta tag. REQ-2 is satisfied by frontend/public/manifest.json with both 'name' and 'short_name' set to 'Shake.com'. REQ-3 is satisfied by updates to AuthenticatedLayout.tsx, LoginScreen.tsx, and DashboardScreen.tsx showing 'Shake.com' branding throughout the UI with no remaining 'Wrapper AI' text visible in the UI components.

hallucinated_features.description: Service worker registration script added to frontend/index.html
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specified a branding/name update only and explicitly forbids changing functional logic. Adding a service worker registration script is a functional addition not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: PWA install banner overlay (PwaInstallBanner) added to App.tsx
hallucinated_features.reason: The file summary mentions a new PwaInstallBanner overlay component added to App.tsx. This is a new feature not requested in the build request, which explicitly states 'Adding new features or pages' is a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: ApiKeySetup component with localStorage-based API key management added to AIChatScreen
hallucinated_features.reason: The file summary describes a new ApiKeySetup component in AIChatScreen that validates and saves Groq API keys to localStorage. This is a new feature not requested in the branding-only update.
